ux.title: Flawless websites and UX
ux.p1: Getting a website online and working takes a lot of testing.
ux.p2: Sitefig helps you focus on what matters and reduces your teams testing effort.

monitor.title: Continuous monitoring
monitor.p1: Automatic and scheduled crawls with private containers.
monitor.p2: Start an on-demand crawl when a new website is ready, no waiting inline.

compliant.title: Get compliant, stay compliant
compliant.p1: Everyone benefits from making your website more accessible.
compliant.p2: Accessibility is user experience, and Sitefig provides you with all the tools to ensure all pages are WCAG compliant.

privacy.title: GDPR issues for your DPO
privacy.sub: Stop worrying about data privacy and GDPR issues.
privacy.p1: Sitefig monitors your website for trackers, cookies, geo-tracking of IPs across the globe, and PII tools to ensure you are not leaking any data.

coreweb.title: Core web metrics
coreweb.p1: Lighthouse is an integrated part of the WASP crawler and Sitefig runs Lighthouse in separated containers with guaranteed resources.

project.title: Effortless project management
project.p1: Create developer friendly tickets straight from the audits.
project.p2: Tickets include source code, documentation and the pages to fix.
